text: Karl Schneider was a Swiss footballer who played for FC Basel. He played in the position as defender. Between the years 1899 and 1901 Schneider played a total of 25 games for Basel without scoring a goal. Seven of these games were in the Swiss Serie A, and 18 were friendly games. In the 1899-1900 season FC Basel did not play competitive football. He was called Schneider (II) and was the team captain in their 1900–01 season. ==Sources and References== * Rotblau: Jahrbuch Saison 2017/2018. Publisher: FC Basel Marketing AG. * Die ersten 125 Jahre. Publisher: Josef Zindel im Friedrich Reinhardt Verlag, Basel. * Verein "Basler Fussballarchiv" Homepage Category:FC Basel players Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Karl Schneider (footballer)
